Row.Text: Every 5 Turn, all of[ICON_Gold]Gold balance will turn into[ICON_Science]Science by a 2:1 ratio. The civiliazation with highest[ICON_Science]Science(except Mona herself) will receive these[ICON_Gold]Gold. [NEWLINE]Every Technology done researching will return[ICON_Gold]Gold, by half of[ICON_Science]Science the Technology required. Free Technology "ASTROLOGY" and "NAVI". Has extra initial vision.
Mona's Special Unit. Can see through features and terrains. Provide adjacent ally units with Defensive[ICON_Strength]strength bonus. Provide +1[ICON_Range]to adjacent Seige units.
Mona's Unique Improvement. Must be built on mountains. Provide massive adjacent bonus for Campus. +1[ICON_GreatScientist]Great scientist point。
阿斯托洛吉斯·莫娜·梅姬斯图斯

每5回合，国库[ICON_Gold]金币将按2:1的比例转换为[ICON_Science]科技值，[ICON_Science]科技值最高的文明(除莫娜自身外)会收到这笔[ICON_Gold]资金。每研究完成一个科技，就获得其所消耗的[ICON_Science]科技值二分之一的[ICON_Gold]金币。[NEWLINE]建成学院区域时施放文化炸弹，学院区的邻接加成也产出[ICON_Production]生产力。[NEWLINE]自动获得“占星术”和“天文导航”科技。游戏开始时获得额外视野。
莫娜的特色支援单位。拥有可穿越地形和地貌的增强视野。相邻的友方单位在防御时获得[ICON_Strength]战斗力加成。能够为相邻的攻城单位提供+1[ICON_Range]射程。
莫娜的特色改良设施。必须修建在山脉上，为学院区域提供巨量邻接加成。+1[ICON_GreatScientist]大科学家点数。
莫娜的特色建筑，随宫殿附赠。每通过特性“伟大的占星术士”获取100科技值，此建筑每回合产出的科技就+1。+1[ICON_GreatScientist]大科学家点数。
